articles.description: The NDRF has been deployed as heavy rains in Mumbai have caused waterlogging across the city affecting private vehicles as well as buses and local trains. | Latest News India
articles.content:
The National Disaster Reponse Force (NDRF) was deployed in Mumbai after heavy rain led to severe waterlogging, disrupting public and private transport on road and partially affecting local trains.
